entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
